title.en: A Prayer to the Garland of Zurmang Trungpa Rinpoche Incarnations

text.en: Oṃ svasti!
text.en-trans: om swasti

text.en: Supreme sovereign of a hundred devas in Tuṣita,
text.en-trans: ganden lha gyé dakpo chokgyur pa

text.en: Magnificent Maitreya, great loving guardian of beings,
text.en-trans: jampa chenpo jamchen drowé gön

text.en: Dharma regent, great heir to the conquerors,
text.en-trans: chökyi gyaltsab gyalsé chenpo ni

text.en: Buddha of the future, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: ma ong sangye dé la solwa deb

text.en: Born into the warrior class, you won attainment through Hevajra,
text.en-trans: gyalrik lé trung gyé dor drubpa nyé

text.en: And with the conduct of a great lord of yogis,
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk chenpö chöpa yi

text.en: Miraculously riding upon a tiger, gained victory over all—
text.en-trans: chok lé namgyal dzutrul tak la chib

text.en: Ḍombī Heruka, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: dombhi heruka la sol la solwa deb

text.en: In the fine mansion of the Vajra Pinnacle of Clear Light,
text.en-trans: ösal dorjé tsemö khang zang du

text.en: You arose in the form of a greatly accomplished vidyādhara,
text.en-trans: rigdzin drubpa chenpö kur zheng té

text.en: A guardian of the sun-like teachings of the supreme vehicle—
text.en-trans: tek chok tenpa nyinmor jepé gön

text.en: Śrī Siṃha, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: shiri singhé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Heart son, blessed by the Great One of Oḍḍiyāna,1
text.en-trans: orgyen chenpö jinlab tuk kyi sé

text.en: Your vajra arrow struck the evil-doing king,
text.en-trans: dik chö gyalpo dorjé da yi bik

text.en: For you were Vajrapāṇi himself in human guise—
text.en-trans: chak na dorjé mi yi dzur zhukpa

text.en: Palgyi Dorje,2at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: pal gyi dorjé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You realized the non-duality of wind-energy and mind,
text.en-trans: lungsem nyimé tokpa ngön du gyur

text.en: And self-liberated all the phenomena of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa as Mahāmudrā,
text.en-trans: khordé chö kün rangdrol chakgya cher

text.en: Never lapsing from that state—Drugu Repa,3
text.en-trans: namyang mi da drugu repa zhé

text.en: Lord of siddhas, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: drubpé wangchuk chenpor solwa deb

text.en: You followed a supreme guru, received profound instructions,
text.en-trans: lama chok ten zabmö dampa tob

text.en: Practised them precisely, so that appearances arose as dharmakāya;
text.en-trans: jizhin nyam lang nangwa chökur char

text.en: And your own mind, too, you realized as unborn dharmakāya—
text.en-trans: rangsem kyemé chöku ngöngyur pa

text.en: Lhopa Gomchung,4at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: lhopa gomchung zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Born into the Nyö clan as an heir to the victorious,
text.en-trans: nyö kyi rik lé trungpé gyalwé sé

text.en: Your power of realization was perfected in knowledge of sūtra and mantra,
text.en-trans: do ngak khyen rab gongpé tsal chen dzok

text.en: And you rose to the crest of an ocean of the learned and accomplished,
text.en-trans: khedrub gyatsö tsuk na rab towa

text.en: Tingma Sangye Drak,5at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: ting ma sangye drak la solwa deb

text.en: Heart-son of Lodrö Rinchen, the great siddha of the practice lineage,
text.en-trans: drubgyü drubchen lodrö rinchen gyi

text.en: Through the great transmission of definitive realization,
text.en-trans: tuksé ngedön tokpé kabab ché

text.en: You attained the kingdom of dharmakāya beyond meditation—
text.en-trans: gommé chökü gyalsa rab nyepa

text.en: Kunga Gyaltsen,6at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: kün ga gyaltsen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In Tserlung you planted the victory banner of accomplishment,
text.en-trans: tser lung né su drubpé gyaltsen tsuk

text.en: And Mahākāla repeatedly revealed to you his joyful face,
text.en-trans: mahakalé gyé zhal yangyang ten

text.en: Supreme sovereign of oceanic power and capacity—
text.en-trans: tutob nüpa gyatsö ngadak chok

text.en: Kunga Zangpo,7at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: künga zangpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Outwardly, you nurtured the conduct of a śrāvaka,
text.en-trans: chi ru nyentö chöpa rab kyang shing

text.en: Inwardly, you assimilated the two kinds of bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: nang du changchub sem nyi tuk la jong

text.en: Secretly, you bound the dharmas of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa within the central channel—
text.en-trans: sangwa khordé chö kün umar dom

text.en: Kunga Özer,8at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: künga özer zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You clearly perceived all knowable things in their infinity,
text.en-trans: rabjam shejé chö kün saler zik

text.en: And held fast the pure aspects of channels, energies and essences,
text.en-trans: tsa lung tiklé dangma yomé ching

text.en: Great leader among the siddhas of Cakrasaṃvara—
text.en-trans: khorlo dompa drubpé khyuchok ché

text.en: Kunga Namgyal,9at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: künga namgyal zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Pre-eminent amidst the oceanic lineage of practice,
text.en-trans: drubgyü gyatsö ü na rab to zhing

text.en: You perfected study, contemplation and meditation, realized suchness,
text.en-trans: tö sam gompé tar sön denyi nyé

text.en: And acquired the most excellent attainment of perfect wisdom—
text.en-trans: yangdak yeshe drubpé puljungwa

text.en: Tenpa Namgyal,10at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: tenpa namgyal zhab la solwa deb

text.en: All the rivers of the lineage of fourfold transmission11merged
text.en-trans: ka zhi gyüpé chulung jinyepa

text.en: Within the ocean of your mind and your brought disciples to maturity,
text.en-trans: tuk tsor kyil né dulja min dzé ching

text.en: Arriving at the highest realization of the paths and stages—
text.en-trans: sa dang lam gyi ngön tak tönpor shek

text.en: Tendzin Chökyi Gyatso,12at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: tendzin chökyi gyatsor la solwa deb

text.en: You acquired the treasure-like instructions of the aural lineage,
text.en-trans: nyengyü dampé ter la wangjor zhing

text.en: Raised the jewelled victory banner of the two kinds of siddhi,
text.en-trans: drub nyi norbü gyaltsen dreng dzepa

text.en: And guided the fortunate along the excellent path to the four kāyas—
text.en-trans: kalden ku zhi lamzang triwé nyen

text.en: Jampal Chökyi Gyatso,13at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: jampal chökyi gyatsor solwa deb

text.en: Foremost among millions of holders of the Karma Kagyü teachings,
text.en-trans: karma kagyü tendzin jewé pul

text.en: You actualized the signs of the path to accomplishing the profound secret,
text.en-trans: zabsang drubpé lam tak ngön du gyur

text.en: And held the perfect strength to act for the benefit of beings—
text.en-trans: zhenpen trinlé tsalshuk rab changwa

text.en: Gyurme Tenpel,14at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: gyurmé tenpel zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You became the heart-son of the Karmapa,
text.en-trans: karma pa yi tuk kyi sé su gyur

text.en: With your vision that perfectly beheld the truth of the definitive meaning,
text.en-trans: ngedön denpa jizhin zikpé chen

text.en: Lord of Dharma, you propagated the aural lineage that matures and liberates—
text.en-trans: chökyi wangchuk nyengyü mindrol pel

text.en: Tenpa Tagyé,15at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: tenpa tagyé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: One and only heart-son of the Mañjughoṣa guru,16
text.en-trans: jamyang lamé tuk kyi sé chikpu

text.en: Sublime leader of the learned and accomplished,
text.en-trans: khé dang drubpé khyuchok labpo ché

text.en: Holder of the vital of the aural transmission of Karma Kagyü—
text.en-trans: karma nyengyü tenpé sokdzin pa

text.en: Chökyi Nyinché,17at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: chökyi nyinjé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In your mind you recalled previous states in the play of rebirth,
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk kün ga lekpa sok

text.en: As learned and accomplished masters of Old and New Schools,
text.en-trans: sar nying khedrub kyewé dögar du

text.en: Including as the lord of yogis, Kunga Lekpa—
text.en-trans: ngön né jesu drenpé tuk ngawa

text.en: Glorious, all-encompassing guru, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khyabdak palden lamar solwa deb

text.en: Conquerors’ heir, great moon of compassion,
text.en-trans: gyalsé nyingjé dawa chenpo ni

text.en: In whom the potential of the enlightened family is fully present,
text.en-trans: changchub rik kyi nüpa yongsu gyé

text.en: Skilled follower of the Great Vehicle’s excellent path to victory—
text.en-trans: tekchen gyalwé lamzang ten khepa

text.en: Karma Trinlé Kunkhyab,18I pray that your life may remain secure.
text.en-trans: karma trinlé künkhyab zhabten sol

text.en: Thus, before this assembly of root and lineage gurus,
text.en-trans: detar tsa gyü lamé tsok nam la

text.en: I devotedly pay homage, make offerings, confess my misdeeds and downfalls,
text.en-trans: güpé chaktsal chö bul diktung shak

text.en: Rejoice in virtue, request the turning of the Wheel of Dharma,
text.en-trans: gé la yirang chökhor korwar kul

text.en: Beseech you not to pass into nirvāṇa but remain, and dedicate stores of virtue.
text.en-trans: nya ngen mi da zhuk sol gé tsok ngo

text.en: May the hosts of beings who extend even unto the limits of space
text.en-trans: dro tsok namkhé patar tukpa nam

text.en: Purify obscurations, perfect the accumulations, and attain the four kāyas.
text.en-trans: drib jang tsok dzok ku zhi gopang tob

text.en: From now until I and others reach the essence of awakening,
text.en-trans: dakzhen deng né changchub nyingpö bar

text.en: May the glorious guru guide us without ever parting!
text.en-trans: palden lamé dralmé jedzin shok
